summary: Dave returns to his hometown on the Massachusetts coast for his father's funeral, where his reunion with two old friends provides a healthy dose of reality.
cast: Sarah Paulson|Chris Messina|Rich Sommer|Natalie Gold|Maryann Plunkett|Alexie Gilmore|Georgia Lyman|Tom O'Brien|Paul O'Brien|George J. Vezina|Phyllis Kay|Tim Haber|John Soares|Tommy Burke|Ted Reinstein|Danielle Muehlen|Roger Haber|Dana Collyer|Donna O'Brien|Eileen Waxler|Alicia Racine|Grace Collins|Dennis O'Neill|Maureen Vlaco|Michaelah Noelle Nunes|Steve Perry
title: Fairhaven
